title: Trouble switching calls.
content: Ever since I purchased the phone I have had trouble switching calls. When I'm on a call and another call comes in, I am unable to answer the new call. An error message pops up when I try to do so,staying unable to switch calls. Even when I get the other person to hang up in order for me to answer the incoming call at times I still can't answer,phone goes black and returns to normal when that calls ends.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
